posts.excerpt:
é—®é¢˜èƒŒæ™¯ï¼šå®ç°ä¸€å…ƒä¸€æ¬¡æ–¹ç¨‹çš„è®¡ç®—ï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ï¼šinputï¼š3a+3=9output:a=2 note:ç»™å‡ºçš„ä¸€å…ƒä¸€æ¬¡æ–¹ç¨‹ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰æ‹¬å· ** * @Author: Nonrustknife <chris> * @Date: 20-Jul-2021 * @Email: cm656879@outlook.com * @Last modified by: chris * @Last modified time: 23-Jul-2021 *//*//å®ç°è§£ä¸€å…ƒä¸€æ¬¡æ–¹ç¨‹//step1 æ¥æ”¶è¾“å…¥ï¼Œå¹¶è½¬æ¢æˆéœ€è¦çš„æ•°æ®æ ¼å¼//step2 ç®—æ³•å®ç°//step3 è¾“å‡ºç»“æœï¼Œå¹¶æ¸…ç†ç¨‹åºèµ„æº1 æ¥æ”¶çš„è¾“å…¥æ ¼å¼ä¸ºä¸€è¡Œå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œé€‰æ‹©å°†å…¶å­˜å‚¨åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­ å£°æ˜éœ€è¦çš„æ•°ç»„èµ„æºï¼Œç±»å‹å¤§å°ï¼› ä½¿ç”¨getcå‡½æ•°æ¥æ”¶è¾“å…¥å¹¶å­˜å‚¨åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­ï¼› å½“æ¥æ”¶åˆ°â€˜
â€™æ—¶è¡¨ç¤ºç»“æŸï¼› å°†å­˜å‚¨åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„è¾“å…¥æ‰“å°å‡ºæ¥æ£€æµ‹æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®ï¼›2 ç®—æ³•æ€è·¯å°±æ˜¯å°†ä¸€å…ƒä¸€æ¬¡è¡¨è¾¾å¼è½¬æ¢ä¸ºAX+B=0çš„å½¢å¼ã€‚ç„¶åç›´æ¥è®¡ç®—X=-(B/A)å³å¯ï¼› å› æ­¤éœ€è¦éå†è¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡ŒåŒºåˆ†åˆå¹¶åŒç±»é¡¹ï¼Œæ ¹æ®é¡¹çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹å¯ä»¥å°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­å­˜å‚¨çš„å†…å®¹åˆ†ä¸ºä¸‰ç±»ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ç¬¦å·ã€æ•°å­—å’Œå­—æ¯ï¼›å®ç°æ—¶æ ¹æ®ASCIIç è¿›è¡ŒåŒºåˆ†ï¼› æ­¤å¤„è®¾è®¡ä¸¤ä¸ªæ ˆï¼ŒAæ ˆå’ŒBæ ˆï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å­˜å‚¨è®¡ç®—ç³»æ•°Aå’ŒBæ—¶çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ä»å³åˆ°å·¦éå†ï¼Œ 1 è‹¥å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å­—æ¯åˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºè¯¥é¡¹ä¸ºAXï¼Œå³éœ€è¦æŠŠå½“å‰æ ˆæŒ‡å‘Aæ ˆï¼Œå¦åˆ™æŒ‡å‘Bæ ˆ 2 è‹¥å…ƒç´ æ˜¯æ•°å­—ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥å­˜å…¥å½“å‰æ ˆ 3 è‹¥å…ƒç´ æ˜¯ç¬¦å·ï¼Œåˆ™æ›´æ–°ç¬¦å·å˜é‡ï¼Œå¹¶è®¡ç®—å½“å‰æ ˆå†…å…ƒç´ ç»„æˆçš„æ•°å­—å¤§å°ï¼Œç´¯åŠ åˆ°ç³»æ•°Aæˆ–Bï¼Œç„¶åæ¸…ç©ºå½“å‰æ ˆå¹¶é‡Šæ”¾å½“å‰æ ˆ*/#include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>#include <math.h>int StoreInput(char *arr, int size){ for(int loop = 0; loop < size; loop++) { scanf("%c", arr+loop); if(*(arr+loop) == '
') { //printf("%s", arr); return loop; } } printf("The input is too long!
"); return 0;}typedef struct node{ int num; struct node* next;}node;void NodeFree(node* head){ node* tNode; while(head->next != NULL) { tNode = head->next; free(head); head = tNode; } return;}node* GetCurNode(node* head){ node* temp = head; while(temp->next != NULL) { temp = temp->next; } return temp;}void NodePush(node* head, int num){ if(head == NULL) { printf("head is NULL!
"); return; } node* curNode = GetCurNode(head); node* nextNode = (node*)malloc(sizeof(node)); nextNode->num = num; nextNode->next = NULL; curNode->next = nextNode;}int NodePop(node* head){ if(head == NULL) { printf("head is NULL!
"); return -1; } int popNum = 0; node* prevNode = head; if(prevNode->next == NULL) { popNum = prevNode->num; //printf("%d
", popNum); free(prevNode); return popNum; } node* relNode = prevNode->next; while(relNode->next != NULL) { prevNode = prevNode->next; relNode = prevNode->next; } popNum = relNode->num; //printf("%d
", popNum); free(relNode); prevNode->next = NULL; return popNum;;}void NodePrint(node* head){ if(head == NULL) { printf("head is NULL!
"); return; } node* curNode = head; //printf("0x%lx:", (unsigned long)head); //printf("%d
", curNode->num); while(curNode->next != NULL) { //printf("0x%lx:", (unsigned long)curNode->next); //printf("%d
", curNode->next->num); curNode = curNode->next; }}int char2Int(char c){ return (int)(c-'0');}char Int2Char(int num){ return (char)(num+'0');}void calcCoef(node* head, int pos, double* coefA, double* coefB, char* unKownNum){ node stackA, stackB; stackA.num = 0; stackA.next = NULL; stackB.num = 0; stackB.next = NULL; node* curStack = &stackB; char popNum; int curStackLen = 0, coefSym = -1; for(int loop = pos; loop > 0; loop--) { popNum = (char)NodePop(head); //printf("loop:%d	num:%c
", loop, Int2Char(popNum)); if((Int2Char(popNum) >= 'a') && (Int2Char(popNum) =< 'z')) { curStack = &stackA; *unKownNum = Int2Char(popNum); if(loop == 1) *coefA += 1; continue; } if((Int2Char(popNum) <= '9') && (Int2Char(popNum) >= '0')) { NodePush(curStack, (int)popNum); curStackLen++; if(loop == 1) { int temp = 0; for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("last|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { *coefA += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; } continue; } if(Int2Char(popNum) == '=') { int temp = 0; //printf("curStackLen:%d
", curStackLen); for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("=|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { if(temp == 0) *coefA += (coefSym) * 1; *coefA += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; coefSym = 1; } if(Int2Char(popNum) == '-') { int temp = 0; for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("-|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { if(temp == 0) { *coefA += (coefSym) * (-1); } *coefA += (coefSym) * (-1) * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * (-1)* temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } //printf("coefA:%f
coefB:%f
", *coefA, *coefB); NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; } if(Int2Char(popNum) == '+') { int temp = 0; for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("+|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { if(temp == 0) { *coefA += (coefSym) * 1; } *coefA += (coefSym) * 1 * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } //printf("coefA:%f
coefB:%f
", *coefA, *coefB); NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; } }}int main(){ char arr[30]; int pos; pos = StoreInput(arr, 30); node *head = (node*)malloc(sizeof(node)); head->num = 0; head->next = NULL; for(int loop = 0; loop < pos; loop++) { NodePush(head, char2Int(*(arr+loop))); } double coefA = 0, coefB = 0; char unKownNum; calcCoef(head, pos, &coefA, &coefB, &unKownNum); printf("A:%f
B:%f
", coefA, coefB); //printf("%c=%03f
", unKownNum, (float)(-coefB/coefA)); printf("
%.2f
", (-coefB/coefA)); NodeFree(head); free(head); return 0;}

â€™æ—¶è¡¨ç¤ºç»“æŸï¼› å°†å­˜å‚¨åœ¨æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„è¾“å…¥æ‰“å°å‡ºæ¥æ£€æµ‹æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®ï¼›2 ç®—æ³•æ€è·¯å°±æ˜¯å°†ä¸€å…ƒä¸€æ¬¡è¡¨è¾¾å¼è½¬æ¢ä¸ºAX+B=0çš„å½¢å¼ã€‚ç„¶åç›´æ¥è®¡ç®—X=-(B/A)å³å¯ï¼› å› æ­¤éœ€è¦éå†è¡¨è¾¾å¼ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡ŒåŒºåˆ†åˆå¹¶åŒç±»é¡¹ï¼Œæ ¹æ®é¡¹çš„ç‰¹ç‚¹å¯ä»¥å°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­å­˜å‚¨çš„å†…å®¹åˆ†ä¸ºä¸‰ç±»ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ç¬¦å·ã€æ•°å­—å’Œå­—æ¯ï¼›å®ç°æ—¶æ ¹æ®ASCIIç è¿›è¡ŒåŒºåˆ†ï¼› æ­¤å¤„è®¾è®¡ä¸¤ä¸ªæ ˆï¼ŒAæ ˆå’ŒBæ ˆï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å­˜å‚¨è®¡ç®—ç³»æ•°Aå’ŒBæ—¶çš„å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå°†æ•°ç»„ä¸­çš„å…ƒç´ ä»å³åˆ°å·¦éå†ï¼Œ 1 è‹¥å…ƒç´ æ˜¯å­—æ¯åˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºè¯¥é¡¹ä¸ºAXï¼Œå³éœ€è¦æŠŠå½“å‰æ ˆæŒ‡å‘Aæ ˆï¼Œå¦åˆ™æŒ‡å‘Bæ ˆ 2 è‹¥å…ƒç´ æ˜¯æ•°å­—ï¼Œåˆ™ç›´æ¥å­˜å…¥å½“å‰æ ˆ 3 è‹¥å…ƒç´ æ˜¯ç¬¦å·ï¼Œåˆ™æ›´æ–°ç¬¦å·å˜é‡ï¼Œå¹¶è®¡ç®—å½“å‰æ ˆå†…å…ƒç´ ç»„æˆçš„æ•°å­—å¤§å°ï¼Œç´¯åŠ åˆ°ç³»æ•°Aæˆ–Bï¼Œç„¶åæ¸…ç©ºå½“å‰æ ˆå¹¶é‡Šæ”¾å½“å‰æ ˆ*/#include <stdio.h>#include <stdlib.h>#include <math.h>int StoreInput(char *arr, int size){ for(int loop = 0; loop < size; loop++) { scanf("%c", arr+loop); if(*(arr+loop) == '
') { //printf("%s", arr); return loop; } } printf("The input is too long!
"); return 0;}typedef struct node{ int num; struct node* next;}node;void NodeFree(node* head){ node* tNode; while(head->next != NULL) { tNode = head->next; free(head); head = tNode; } return;}node* GetCurNode(node* head){ node* temp = head; while(temp->next != NULL) { temp = temp->next; } return temp;}void NodePush(node* head, int num){ if(head == NULL) { printf("head is NULL!
"); return; } node* curNode = GetCurNode(head); node* nextNode = (node*)malloc(sizeof(node)); nextNode->num = num; nextNode->next = NULL; curNode->next = nextNode;}int NodePop(node* head){ if(head == NULL) { printf("head is NULL!
"); return -1; } int popNum = 0; node* prevNode = head; if(prevNode->next == NULL) { popNum = prevNode->num; //printf("%d
", popNum); free(prevNode); return popNum; } node* relNode = prevNode->next; while(relNode->next != NULL) { prevNode = prevNode->next; relNode = prevNode->next; } popNum = relNode->num; //printf("%d
", popNum); free(relNode); prevNode->next = NULL; return popNum;;}void NodePrint(node* head){ if(head == NULL) { printf("head is NULL!
"); return; } node* curNode = head; //printf("0x%lx:", (unsigned long)head); //printf("%d
", curNode->num); while(curNode->next != NULL) { //printf("0x%lx:", (unsigned long)curNode->next); //printf("%d
", curNode->next->num); curNode = curNode->next; }}int char2Int(char c){ return (int)(c-'0');}char Int2Char(int num){ return (char)(num+'0');}void calcCoef(node* head, int pos, double* coefA, double* coefB, char* unKownNum){ node stackA, stackB; stackA.num = 0; stackA.next = NULL; stackB.num = 0; stackB.next = NULL; node* curStack = &stackB; char popNum; int curStackLen = 0, coefSym = -1; for(int loop = pos; loop > 0; loop--) { popNum = (char)NodePop(head); //printf("loop:%d	num:%c
", loop, Int2Char(popNum)); if((Int2Char(popNum) >= 'a') && (Int2Char(popNum) =< 'z')) { curStack = &stackA; *unKownNum = Int2Char(popNum); if(loop == 1) *coefA += 1; continue; } if((Int2Char(popNum) <= '9') && (Int2Char(popNum) >= '0')) { NodePush(curStack, (int)popNum); curStackLen++; if(loop == 1) { int temp = 0; for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("last|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { *coefA += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; } continue; } if(Int2Char(popNum) == '=') { int temp = 0; //printf("curStackLen:%d
", curStackLen); for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("=|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { if(temp == 0) *coefA += (coefSym) * 1; *coefA += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; coefSym = 1; } if(Int2Char(popNum) == '-') { int temp = 0; for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("-|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { if(temp == 0) { *coefA += (coefSym) * (-1); } *coefA += (coefSym) * (-1) * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * (-1)* temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } //printf("coefA:%f
coefB:%f
", *coefA, *coefB); NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; } if(Int2Char(popNum) == '+') { int temp = 0; for(int loop = 0; loop < curStackLen; loop++) { temp += pow(10, curStackLen-1-loop) * NodePop(curStack); } //printf("+|temp:%d
", temp); if(curStack == &stackA) { if(temp == 0) { *coefA += (coefSym) * 1; } *coefA += (coefSym) * 1 * temp; //printf("coefA:%f
", *coefA); } if(curStack == &stackB) { *coefB += (coefSym) * temp; //printf("coefB:%f
", *coefB); } //printf("coefA:%f
coefB:%f
", *coefA, *coefB); NodeFree(curStack); curStack = &stackB; curStackLen = 0; } }}int main(){ char arr[30]; int pos; pos = StoreInput(arr, 30); node *head = (node*)malloc(sizeof(node)); head->num = 0; head->next = NULL; for(int loop = 0; loop < pos; loop++) { NodePush(head, char2Int(*(arr+loop))); } double coefA = 0, coefB = 0; char unKownNum; calcCoef(head, pos, &coefA, &coefB, &unKownNum); printf("A:%f
B:%f
", coefA, coefB); //printf("%c=%03f
", unKownNum, (float)(-coefB/coefA)); printf("
%.2f
", (-coefB/coefA)); NodeFree(head); free(head); return 0;}

posts.title: HELLO WORLD
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
